title: (x) Script from Trina Turk - Holiday Script {Paul H, Lex}
content:
Does anyone recognize this script? I thought it was a House font but I'm wrong... Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130722171559im_/http:/typophile.com/files/script_4364.gif)
author: izzyce

comments.content: The S looks quite like [Studio Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20130722171559/http:/www.itcfonts.com/fonts/detail.aspx?PID=261356)'s, but that's it. That w is very distinctive.

I think it's [Holiday Script.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130722171559/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg12.html) I'll get the link.

- Lex
Yeah. I think I’ll need a new catalogue. It wasn’ t in the (old) one I have. Looked House right away like Isabella assumed.

Paul is doubly connected to that ID, because he was the one who provided the sample of Holiday Script that Lex linked to in the Script Guide. (Thanks again Paul.)

- Mike Yanega
Thanks so much! I guess I have the old catalogue too. It screams "House" so I should have gone with my gut I suppose :)
